name: Castro
description: One Of The Best Music Bot's In The World.
feature1: Music, It can play different kind of music from different platforms like spotify, etc.
feature2: 24/7 Music, It can play music 24/7 without any problem and it is free forever.
feature3: Stream your selected audio in the premium quality for free, without any ads 24/7.
feature4: Intuitive interface; control everything with simple commands.
